meanings.definition: A person who is excessively preoccupied with a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: Some obsessives spend hours researching their favorite topics online.
meanings.sent2: The group of obsessives gathered regularly to discuss their shared interests.
meanings.sent3: The obsessives at the comic book convention were in their element, surrounded by like-minded fans.
meanings.sent4: Her friends jokingly referred to her as the queen of the obsessives due to her intense passion for collecting stamps.
meanings.sent5: The obsessives' dedication to their hobbies knew no bounds, making them stand out in a crowd.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an obsession.
meanings.sent1: His obsessive behavior towards cleanliness was evident in every corner of his house.
meanings.sent2: The artist's obsessives attention to detail resulted in a masterpiece that captivated viewers.
meanings.sent3: The obsessives focus on perfection sometimes led to humorous mishaps in his work.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with an obsessive silence, as if time had frozen in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The obsessive nature of his personality made him a perfectionist in everything he did.
